cards.name: Awaken the Erstwhile
cards.text: Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then creates that many 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
cards.flavor: In preparation for the conflict all foresaw, the Golgari called upon an army that had slept for millennia beneath the city.

rulings.text: The number of Zombie tokens each player creates is equal to the number of cards that player discarded, not the total number of cards discarded.

foreignNames.name: Erweckung der Einstmaligen
foreignNames.text: Jeder Spieler wirft alle Karten aus seiner Hand ab und erzeugt dann entsprechend viele 2/2 schwarze Zombie-Kreaturenspielsteine.
foreignNames.flavor: In Vorbereitung auf einen Konflikt, den alle vorhersahen, riefen die Golgari eine Armee, die seit Jahrtausenden unter der Stadt schlummerte.

foreignNames.name: Despertar a los Arcaicos
foreignNames.text: Cada jugador descarta todas las cartas de su mano, luego crea esa misma cantidad de fichas de criatura Zombie negras 2/2.
foreignNames.flavor: Como preparación para el conflicto que todos anticipaban, los golgari alzaron un ejército que llevaba milenios durmiendo bajo la ciudad.

foreignNames.name: Éveil des Naguères
foreignNames.text: Chaque joueur se défausse de toutes les cartes de sa main, puis crée autant de jetons de créature 2/2 noire Zombie.
foreignNames.flavor: En vue du conflit que tous pressentaient, les Golgari firent appel à une armée endormie depuis des millénaires sous la ville.

foreignNames.name: Risvegliare gli Antecessori
foreignNames.text: Ogni giocatore scarta tutte le carte nella propria mano, poi crea altrettante pedine creatura Zombie 2/2 nere.
foreignNames.flavor: In preparazione del conflitto che tutti prevedevano, i Golgari richiamarono un esercito rimasto sopito per millenni nelle viscere della città.

foreignNames.name: 往時軍の覚醒
foreignNames.text: 各プレイヤーはそれぞれ、自分の手札にあるカードをすべて捨て、その後、その枚数に等しい数の黒の２/２のゾンビ・クリーチャー・トークンを生成する。
foreignNames.flavor: すべてが予言されていた抗争に備えるため、ゴルガリは都市の地下で何千年もの間眠っていた軍勢を呼び覚ました。

foreignNames.name: 망자의 군대 깨우기
foreignNames.text: 각 플레이어는 자신의 손에 있는 모든 카드를 버린 후, 버린 카드 장수만큼 2/2 흑색 좀비 토큰을 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: 모두가 예견한 대립을 준비하면서, 골가리는 도시 아래에서 천 년간 잠들어 있던 군대를 불러냈다.

foreignNames.name: Despertar os Vetustos
foreignNames.text: Cada jogador descarta todos os cards da própria mão e, em seguida, cria aquela quantidade de fichas de criatura preta 2/2 do tipo Zumbi.
foreignNames.flavor: Preparando-se para o conflito previsto por todos, os Golgari convocaram um exército que dormira por milênios sob a cidade.

foreignNames.name: Пробуждение Былых
foreignNames.text: Каждый игрок сбрасывает все карты из своей руки, затем создает такое же количество фишек существа 2/2 черный Зомби.
foreignNames.flavor: Готовясь к схватке, которую не предвидел лишь слепой, Голгари призвали на службу армию, тысячелетиями дремавшую под городом.

foreignNames.name: 唤醒故军
foreignNames.text: 每位牌手各弃掉其手牌，然后派出等量的2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 为备战迫在眉睫的冲突，葛加理唤醒了已在城市地底长眠数千年之久的军队。

foreignNames.name: 喚醒故軍
foreignNames.text: 每位玩家各棄掉其手牌，然後派出等量的2/2黑色殭屍衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 為備戰迫在眉睫的衝突，葛加理喚醒了已在城市地底長眠數千年之久的軍隊。

cards.originalText: Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then creates that many 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

cards.name: Bankrupt in Blood
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice two creatures.
Draw three cards.
cards.flavor: "Your spirits can rest in peace, for your debts are paid."

rulings.text: You must sacrifice exactly two creatures to cast Bankrupt in Blood; you can’t cast it without sacrificing two creatures, and you can’t sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can respond only after Bankrupt in Blood has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creatures you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.

foreignNames.name: Blutiges Moratorium
foreignNames.text:
Opfere zwei Kreaturen als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken.
Ziehe drei Karten.
foreignNames.flavor: „Eure Seelen können in Frieden ruhen, denn eure Schulden sind beglichen."

foreignNames.name: Bancarrota sangrienta
foreignNames.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, sacrifica dos criaturas.
Roba tres cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Pueden descansar en paz, pues ya saldaron sus deudas".

foreignNames.name: Faillite sanglante
foreignNames.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, sacrifiez deux créatures.
Piochez trois cartes.
foreignNames.flavor: « Vos esprits peuvent reposer en paix, car vos dettes sont acquittées. »

foreignNames.name: Bancarotta di Sangue
foreignNames.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, sacrifica due creature.
Pesca tre carte.
foreignNames.flavor: "I vostri spiriti possono riposare in pace, poiché i vostri debiti sono stati saldati."

foreignNames.name: 血液破綻
foreignNames.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、クリーチャー２体を生け贄に捧げる。
カードを３枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「債務の支払いにより、君の魂は安らかに眠れるだろう。」

foreignNames.name: 피로 인한 파산
foreignNames.text:
이 주문을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 생물 두 개를 희생한다.
카드 세 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "너희는 빚을 모두 갚았으니, 너희의 영혼들은 평온한 안식을 누릴 수 있다."

foreignNames.name: Falir em Sangue
foreignNames.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, sacrifique duas criaturas.
Compre três cards.
foreignNames.flavor: "Seus espíritos podem descansar em paz, pois suas dívidas estão pagas."

foreignNames.name: Кровавое Банкротство
foreignNames.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания этого заклинания пожертвуйте два существа.
Возьмите три карты.
foreignNames.flavor: «Твои духи могут упокоиться с миром, ибо твой долг выплачен».

foreignNames.name: 负债血偿
foreignNames.text:
牺牲两个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
抓三张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「你的负债尽数付讫，你的灵魂现可安息。」

foreignNames.name: 負債血償
foreignNames.text:
犧牲兩個生物，以作為施放此咒語的額外費用。
抽三張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「你的負債盡數付訖，你的靈魂現可安息。」

cards.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice two creatures.
Draw three cards.

cards.name: Blade Juggler
cards.text:
Spectacle {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
When Blade Juggler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

rulings.text: Damage dealt to a player causes that player to lose that much life.

Spectacle doesn’t change when you can cast the card. For example, you can’t cast a sorcery with spectacle during an opponent’s turn unless another effect allows you to do so, even if that player has lost life this turn.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying (such as a spectacle cost), add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
A card’s spectacle cost is the same no matter how much life your opponents lost or how many opponents lost life.

In a multiplayer game, if an opponent loses life and later that turn leaves the game, you can cast a spell for its spectacle cost. (If a player leaves the game during their turn, that turn continues without an active player.)

foreignNames.name: Klingenjongleurin
foreignNames.text:
Spektakel {2}{B} (Du kannst diesen Zauberspruch für seine Spektakel-Kosten anstelle seiner Manakosten wirken, falls ein Gegner in diesem Zug Lebenspunkte verloren hat.)
Wenn die Klingenjongleurin ins Spiel kommt, fügt sie dir 1 Schadenspunkt zu und du ziehst eine Karte.

foreignNames.name: Juglar de filos
foreignNames.text:
Espectáculo {2}{B}. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo por su coste de espectáculo en vez de por su coste de maná si un oponente perdió vidas este turno.)
Cuando la Juglar de filos entre al campo de batalla, te hace 1 punto de daño y robas una carta.

foreignNames.name: Jongleuse de lames
foreignNames.text:
Spectacle {2}{B} (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort pour son coût de spectacle à la place de son coût de mana si un adversaire a perdu des points de vie ce tour-ci.)
Quand la Jongleuse de lames arrive sur le champ de bataille, elle vous inflige 1 blessure et vous piochez une carte.

foreignNames.name: Giocoliera di Lame
foreignNames.text:
Spettacolo {2}{B} (Puoi lanciare questa magia per il suo costo di spettacolo invece del suo costo di mana se un avversario ha perso punti vita in questo turno.)
Quando la Giocoliera di Lame entra nel campo di battaglia, ti infligge 1 danno e peschi una carta.

foreignNames.name: 刃の曲芸人
foreignNames.text:
絢爛{2}{B}（このターンに対戦相手がライフを失っていたなら、あなたはこの呪文を、これのマナ・コストではなく絢爛コストで唱えてもよい。）
刃の曲芸人が戦場に出たとき、これはあなたに１点のダメージを与え、あなたはカードを１枚引く。

foreignNames.name: 칼날 저글러
foreignNames.text:
구경거리 {2}{B} (상대가 이 턴에 생명점을 잃었다면 당신은 이 주문을 마나 비용 대신 구경거리 비용으로 발동할 수 있다.)
칼날 저글러가 전장에 들어올 때, 칼날 저글러는 당신에게 피해 1점을 입히고 당신은 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignNames.name: Malabarista de Lâminas
foreignNames.text:
Espetáculo {2}{B} (Você pode conjurar esta mágica por seu custo de espetáculo, em vez de seu custo de mana, se um oponente perdeu pontos de vida neste turno.)
Quando Malabarista de Lâminas entra no campo de batalha, ela causa 1 ponto de dano a você e você compra um card.

foreignNames.name: Жонглер Клинками
foreignNames.text:
Зрелище {2}{B} (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание за его стоимость Зрелища вместо его мана-стоимости, если оппонент терял жизнь(-и) в этом ходу).
Когда Жонглер Клинками выходит на поле битвы, он наносит вам 1 повреждение, и вы берете карту.

foreignNames.name: 耍刀客
foreignNames.text:
揭幕{2}{B}（如果本回合有对手曾失去生命，则你可以支付此咒语的揭幕费用而非法术力费用来施放它。）
当耍刀客进战场时，它对你造成1点伤害且你抓一张牌。

foreignNames.name: 耍刀客
foreignNames.text:
揭幕{2}{B}（如果本回合有對手曾失去生命，則你可以支付此咒語的揭幕費用而非魔法力費用來施放它。）
當耍刀客進戰場時，它對你造成1點傷害且你抽一張牌。

cards.originalText:
Spectacle {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
When Blade Juggler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

cards.name: Bladebrand
cards.text:
Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"The pain of searing iron and razor edges pales beside the pleasure of performance."
—Judith

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Bladebrand tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You don’t draw a card.

foreignNames.name: Klingenbrand
foreignNames.text:
Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält Todesberührung bis zum Ende des Zuges.
Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Der Schmerz des glutheißen Metalls und der scharfen Klingen ist nichts gegen die Ekstase während der Vorstellung."
—Judith

foreignNames.name: Marcar al rojo vivo
foreignNames.text:
La criatura objetivo gana la habilidad de toque mortal hasta el final del turno.
Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor:
"El dolor del hierro candente y de las hojas afiladas no es nada frente al placer del espectáculo".
—Judith

foreignNames.name: Lame-brandon
foreignNames.text:
La créature ciblée acquiert le contact mortel jusqu'à la fin du tour.
Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor:
« La douleur du fer brûlant et des fils de rasoir n'est rien comparée au plaisir de la performance. »
—Judith

foreignNames.name: Lame Ustionanti
foreignNames.text:
Una creatura bersaglio ha tocco letale fino alla fine del turno.
Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Il dolore del ferro incandescente e delle lame affilate impallidisce di fronte al piacere dell'esibizione."
—Judith

foreignNames.name: 焼印刃
foreignNames.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは接死を得る。
カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor:
「焼けつくような鉄とカミソリのように鋭い杭の痛みはショーの快楽と紙一重よ。」
――ジュディス

foreignNames.name: 불꽃칼날술
foreignNames.text:
생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 치명타를 얻는다.
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"불타는 쇳덩이와 칼날의 고통은 공연의 기쁨 앞에서 빛이 바랜다."
—주디스

foreignNames.name: Lâmina Cauterizante
foreignNames.text:
A criatura alvo ganha toque mortífero até o final do turno.
Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor:
"A dor do ferro calcinante e das lâminas afiadas é ínfima ante o prazer da performance."
— Judith

foreignNames.name: Клеймящие Клинки
foreignNames.text:
Целевое существо получает Смертельное касание до конца хода.
Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Боль от раскаленного железа и острых клинков — ничто по сравнению с удовольствием от выступления».
— Джудит

foreignNames.name: 炙烤剑尖
foreignNames.text:
目标生物获得死触异能直到回合结束。
抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor:
「在表演的快感之下， 炙热铁器和尖锐利刃带来的痛楚显得苍白无力。」
～裘蒂丝

foreignNames.name: 炙烤劍尖
foreignNames.text:
目標生物獲得死觸異能直到回合結束。
抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor:
「在表演的快感之下， 炙熱鐵器和尖銳利刃帶來的痛楚顯得蒼白無力。」
～裘蒂絲

cards.originalText:
Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Bloodmist Infiltrator
cards.text: Whenever Bloodmist Infiltrator attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Bloodmist Infiltrator can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor: Blood seeks blood, and nothing shall hold back its hunger.

foreignNames.name: Blutnebel-Infiltrator
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn der Blutnebel-Infiltrator angreift, kannst du eine andere Kreatur opfern. Falls du dies tust, kann der Blutnebel-Infiltrator in diesem Zug nicht geblockt werden.
foreignNames.flavor: Blut begehrt mehr Blut, und nichts kann seinen Hunger aufhalten.

foreignNames.name: Infiltrador sangreniebla
foreignNames.text: Siempre que el Infiltrador sangreniebla ataque, puedes sacrificar otra criatura. Si lo haces, el Infiltrador sangreniebla no puede ser bloqueado este turno.
foreignNames.flavor: La sangre busca la sangre, y nada detendrá su apetito.

foreignNames.name: Infiltrateur brumesang
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que l'Infiltrateur brumesang attaque, vous pouvez sacrifier une autre créature. Si vous faites ainsi, l'Infiltrateur brumesang ne peut pas être bloqué ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor: Le sang appelle le sang et rien ne réprimera sa faim.

foreignNames.name: Infiltrato della Nebbia di Sangue
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta l'Infiltrato della Nebbia di Sangue attacca, puoi sacrificare un'altra creatura. Se lo fai, l'Infiltrato della Nebbia di Sangue non può essere bloccato in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Il sangue brama altro sangue e niente può frenare la sua fame.

foreignNames.name: 血霧の潜入者
foreignNames.text: 血霧の潜入者が攻撃するたび、あなたは他のクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げてもよい。そうしたなら、このターン、血霧の潜入者はブロックされない。
foreignNames.flavor: 血は血を求める。何者もその飢えを抑えてはならない。

foreignNames.name: 피안개 침투자
foreignNames.text: 피안개 침투자가 공격할 때마다, 당신은 다른 생물 한 개를 희생할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 피안개 침투자는 이 턴에 방어될 수 없다.
foreignNames.flavor: 피는 피를 갈망하고, 그 어떤 것도 그 굶주림을 막을 수 없다.

foreignNames.name: Infiltrador Sanguinévoa
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que Infiltrador Sanguinévoa ataca, você pode sacrificar outra criatura. Se fizer isso, Infiltrador Sanguinévoa não poderá ser bloqueado neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor: O sangue busca sangue, e nada conterá sua fome.

foreignNames.name: Диверсант Кровавого Тумана
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда Диверсант Кровавого Тумана атакует, вы можете пожертвовать другое существо. Если вы это делаете, Диверсант Кровавого Тумана не может быть заблокирован в этом ходу.
foreignNames.flavor: Кровь ищет кровь, и ничто не может сдержать этот голод.

foreignNames.name: 血雾渗透者
foreignNames.text: 每当血雾渗透者攻击时，你可以牺牲另一个生物。若你如此作，则血雾渗透者本回合不能被阻挡。
foreignNames.flavor: 血觅血而行，任万物都压抑不住它的饥渴。

foreignNames.name: 血霧滲透者
foreignNames.text: 每當血霧滲透者攻擊時，你可以犧牲另一個生物。若你如此作，則血霧滲透者本回合不能被阻擋。
foreignNames.flavor: 血覓血而行，任萬物都壓抑不住它的飢渴。

cards.originalText: Whenever Bloodmist Infiltrator attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Bloodmist Infiltrator can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Carrion Imp
cards.text:
Flying
When Carrion Imp enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: No scrap of nutrition goes to waste in the undercity.

foreignNames.name: Aasbold
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Aasbold ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus einem Friedhof ins Exil schicken. Falls du dies tust, erhältst du 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: In der Unterstadt wird kein Bissen Nahrung verschwendet.

foreignNames.name: Diablillo carroñero
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Diablillo carroñero entre al campo de batalla, puedes exiliar la carta de criatura objetivo de un cementerio. Si lo haces, ganas 2 vidas.
foreignNames.flavor: Nada que sea nutritivo se desperdicia en la Subciudad.

foreignNames.name: Diablotin charognard
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand le Diablotin charognard arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez exiler une carte de créature ciblée depuis un cimetière. Si vous faites ainsi, vous gagnez 2 points de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: Rien ne se perd dans la Citerraine.

foreignNames.name: Imp Necrofago
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando l'Imp Necrofago entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi esiliare una carta creatura bersaglio da un cimitero. Se lo fai, guadagni 2 punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor: Nessun brandello di nutrimento viene sprecato nella città sepolta.

foreignNames.name: 屍肉インプ
foreignNames.text:
飛行
屍肉インプが戦場に出たとき、墓地からクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。あなたはそれを追放してもよい。そうしたなら、あなたは２点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 地底街では、栄養の一欠片も無駄になることはない。

foreignNames.name: 송장 임프
foreignNames.text:
비행
송장 임프가 전장에 들어올 때, 무덤에 있는 생물 카드 한 장을 목표로 정한다. 당신은 그 카드를 추방할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 지하 도시에서는 어떤 영양분도 낭비되지 않는다.

foreignNames.name: Diabrete Carniceiro
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Quando Diabrete Carniceiro entra no campo de batalha, você pode exilar o card de criatura alvo de um cemitério. Se fizer isso, você ganhará 2 pontos de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Nenhuma migalha nutritiva é desperdiçada no submundo.

foreignNames.name: Бес-Падальщик
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Когда Бес-Падальщик выходит на поле битвы, вы можете изгнать целевую карту существа из кладбища. Если вы это делаете, вы получаете 2 жизни.
foreignNames.flavor: В подземном городе не пропадает ни крошки пищи.

foreignNames.name: 腐肉小恶魔
foreignNames.text:
飞行
当腐肉小恶魔进战场时，你可以将目标生物牌从坟墓场放逐。若你如此作，则你获得2点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 地底城里的营养分毫都不会被浪费。

foreignNames.name: 腐肉小惡魔
foreignNames.text:
飛行
當腐肉小惡魔進戰場時，你可以將目標生物牌從墳墓場放逐。若你如此作，則你獲得2點生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 地底城裡的營養分毫都不會被浪費。

cards.originalText:
Flying
When Carrion Imp enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Catacomb Crocodile
cards.flavor:
"I am sewer-king!" said Rat. "I am quick and cunning and I know every tunnel."
"No, I am king!" said Zombie. "I am cold and deadly and no rot can harm me."
Then Croc came and ate them both.

foreignNames.name: Katakombenkrokodil
foreignNames.flavor:
„Ich bin der König der Kanalisation!", sagte die Ratte. „Ich bin flink und schlau und ich kenne jeden Tunnel."
„Nein, ich bin der König!", sagte der Zombie. „Ich bin kalt und tödlich und kann nicht verfaulen."
Dann kam das Krokodil und fraß beide auf.

foreignNames.name: Cocodrilo de la catacumba
foreignNames.flavor:
"¡Soy la reina de las alcantarillas!", dijo la Rata. "Soy rápida, astuta y conozco todos los túneles."
"No, ¡yo soy el rey!", dijo el Zombie. "Soy frío, letal y la podredumbre no puede dañarme."
Entonces llegó el Cocodrilo y se los comió a los dos.

foreignNames.name: Crocodile des catacombes
foreignNames.flavor:
« Je suis le roi des égouts ! dit le rat. Je suis rapide et rusé, et je connais tous les tunnels. »
« Non, c'est moi le roi ! dit le zombie. Je suis froid et meurtrier et la pourriture ne peut rien contre moi. »
Puis Croc vint et les dévora tous les deux.

foreignNames.name: Coccodrillo della Catacomba
foreignNames.flavor:
"Io sono il re della fogna!" disse il Ratto. "Sono veloce e astuto e conosco tutti i tunnel."
"No, io sono il re!" disse lo Zombie. "Sono freddo e letale e la putredine non mi danneggia."
Poi arrivò il Coccodrillo e li sbranò entrambi.

foreignNames.name: 地下墓地のクロコダイル
foreignNames.flavor:
「俺が下水の王だ！」ネズミは言った。「俺はすばしっこくて悪賢い。どんなトンネルでも知ってる。」
「いや、俺が王だ！」ゾンビは言った。「俺は冷たくて恐ろしい。どんな腐敗も俺を蝕むことはできない。」
そこへワニがやって来て、どちらも食べてしまった。

foreignNames.name: 지하묘지 악어
foreignNames.flavor:
"내가 시궁창의 왕이다!" 쥐가 말했다. "나는 빠르고 약삭빠른데다가 모든 터널을 알고 있어."
"아니, 내가 왕이다!" 좀비가 말했다. "나는 차갑고 치명적이며 썩는 것은 나를 해칠 수 없지."
그 말이 끝나기 무섭게 악어가 다가와 둘을 모두 먹어치웠다.

foreignNames.name: Crocodilo da Catacumba
foreignNames.flavor:
"Eu sou o Rei do Esgoto!", disse o Rato. "Eu sou rápido, sagaz e conheço cada túnel."
"Não, eu sou o rei!", disse o Zumbi. "Eu sou frio, mortífero e a podridão não me afeta."
Então chegou o Crocodilo e comeu os dois.

foreignNames.name: Крокодил из Катакомб
foreignNames.flavor:
«Я — королева стоков! — заявила крыса. — Я ловкая, хитрая и знаю все тоннели».
«Нет, я король! — ответил зомби. — Я холоден, несу смерть, и никакая гниль меня не тронет».
А потом явился крокодил и проглотил обоих.

foreignNames.name: 陵墓鳄鱼
foreignNames.flavor:
「我是下水道之王！」老鼠说道。「我又快又精，每条隧道都一清二楚。」
「我才是下水道之王！」灵俑说道。「我又酷又强，潮湿腐败都伤不了我。
」
然后鳄鱼出现，一口吃掉他俩。

foreignNames.name: 陵墓鱷魚
foreignNames.flavor:
「我是下水道之王！」老鼠說道。「我又快又精，每條隧道都一清二楚。」
「我才是下水道之王！」殭屍說道。「我又酷又強，潮濕腐敗都傷不了我。」
然後鱷魚出現，一口吃掉他倆。

cards.name: Clear the Stage
cards.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Make way! It's time for the final act!"

rulings.text: You can’t cast Clear the Stage without a target creature to get -3/-3. If either target is illegal when Clear the Stage tries to resolve, the other is still affected as appropriate.

You may always choose a target creature card in your graveyard, even if you don’t control a creature with power 4 or greater. Whether you return the creature card is determined only as Clear the Stage resolves.
You check whether you control a creature with power 4 or greater after the target creature gets -3/-3 but before it dies, if appropriate.

foreignNames.name: Bühne frei
foreignNames.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält -3/-3 bis zum Ende des Zuges. Falls du eine Kreatur mit Stärke 4 oder mehr kontrollierst, kannst du bis zu eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurückbringen.
foreignNames.flavor: „Platz da! Es ist Zeit für den letzten Akt!"

foreignNames.name: Despejar el escenario
foreignNames.text: La criatura objetivo obtiene -3/-3 hasta el final del turno. Si controlas una criatura con fuerza de 4 o más, puedes regresar hasta una carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor: "¡Hagan sitio! ¡Es la hora del acto final!".

foreignNames.name: Dégager la piste
foreignNames.text: La créature ciblée gagne -3/-3 jusqu'à la fin du tour. Si vous contrôlez une créature de force supérieure ou égale à 4, vous pouvez renvoyer jusqu'à une carte de créature ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
foreignNames.flavor: « Faites place ! C'est l'heure du dernier acte ! »

foreignNames.name: Liberare la Scena
foreignNames.text: Una creatura bersaglio prende -3/-3 fino alla fine del turno. Se controlli una creatura con forza pari o superiore a 4, puoi riprendere in mano fino a una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: "Fate largo! È ora dell'ultimo atto!"

foreignNames.name: 舞台一掃
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体と、あなたの墓地からクリーチャー・カード最大１枚を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、その前者のクリーチャーは－３/－３の修整を受ける。あなたがパワーが４以上のクリーチャーをコントロールしているなら、あなたはその後者のカードをあなたの手札に戻してもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: 「道を空けろ！フィナーレの時間だ！」

foreignNames.name: 무대 정리
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -3/-3을 받는다. 당신이 공격력이 4 이상인 생물을 조종한다면, 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드를 최대 한 장까지 목표로 정한다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌릴 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: "비켜! 최종장을 선보일 시간이다!"

foreignNames.name: Esvaziar o Palco
foreignNames.text: A criatura alvo recebe -3/-3 até o final do turno. Se você controlar uma criatura com poder igual ou superior a 4, você poderá devolver até um card de criatura alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor: "Abram alas! É hora do último ato!"

foreignNames.name: Очищение Сцены
foreignNames.text: Целевое существо получает -3/-3 до конца хода. Если вы контролируете существо с силой 4 или больше, вы можете вернуть не более одной целевой карты существа из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
foreignNames.flavor: «Расступитесь! Настало время последнего акта!»

foreignNames.name: 清空舞台
foreignNames.text: 目标生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则你可以将至多一张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「都让让！最后一幕即将上演！」

foreignNames.name: 清空舞台
foreignNames.text: 目標生物得-3/-3直到回合結束。如果你操控力量等於或大於4的生物，則你可以將至多一張目標生物牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「都讓讓！最後一幕即將上演！」

cards.originalText: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Consign to the Pit
cards.text: Destroy target creature. Consign to the Pit deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
cards.flavor: First your whole life flashes before your eyes. Then you have considerable time to reflect on every regret as you plummet.

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Consign to the Pit tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. No player is dealt damage. If the target is legal but not destroyed (most likely because it has indestructible), its controller is dealt damage.

foreignNames.name: In die Grube werfen
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. In die Grube werfen fügt dem Beherrscher der Kreatur 2 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Erst siehst du dein ganzes Leben im Zeitraffer. Dann hast du reichlich Zeit, während des Sturzes jeden deiner Fehltritte zu bereuen.

foreignNames.name: Mandar al foso
foreignNames.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo. Mandar al foso hace 2 puntos de daño al controlador de esa criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Primero, tu vida entera pasa ante tus ojos. Luego, tienes tiempo de sobra para reflexionar sobre todo lo que te arrepientes mientras caes y caes.

foreignNames.name: Consigner à la fosse
foreignNames.text: Détruisez une créature ciblée. Consigner à la fosse inflige 2 blessures au contrôleur de cette créature.
foreignNames.flavor: D'abord, votre vie défile devant vos yeux. Puis vous avez suffisamment de temps pour réfléchir à chacun de vos regrets pendant votre chute.

foreignNames.name: Relegare nell'Abisso
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio. Relegare nell'Abisso infligge 2 danni al controllore di quella creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: All'inizio tutta la vita ti scorre di fronte agli occhi, dopodiché ti resta una notevole quantità di tempo per riflettere su tutti i tuoi rimpianti mentre precipiti.

foreignNames.name: 奈落への放逐
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。奈落への放逐はそのクリーチャーのコントローラーに２点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: まず、お前の一生が目の前を駆け巡る。その後、真っ逆さまに落ちながら、すべての後悔を振り返るのに十分な長い時間が与えられる。

foreignNames.name: 구덩이에 집어넣기
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다. 구덩이에 집어넣기는 그 생물의 조종자에게 피해 2점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 우선은 주마등이 스쳐지나간다. 그 후에는 곤두박질치는 동안 온갖 후회를 되새길만한 충분한 시간이 있다.

foreignNames.name: Condenar ao Poço
foreignNames.text: Destrua a criatura alvo. Condenar ao Poço causa 2 pontos de dano ao controlador daquela criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Primeiro, toda a sua vida passa diante de seus olhos. Depois, você tem um tempo considerável para refletir sobre cada coisa de que se arrepende enquanto afunda.

foreignNames.name: Низвержение в Яму
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевое существо. Низвержение в Яму наносит 2 повреждения игроку, контролирующему то существо.
foreignNames.flavor: Сперва вся жизнь проносится у тебя перед глазами. А потом, пока летишь вниз, остается время поразмышлять над каждым неудачным решением.

foreignNames.name: 坠入深渊
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标生物。坠入深渊对该生物的操控者造成2点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 一开始，你的眼前会浮现此生往事。随后，你有足够的时间在下坠过程中反思每一丝悔恨。

foreignNames.name: 墜入深淵
foreignNames.text: 消滅目標生物。墜入深淵對該生物的操控者造成2點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 一開始，你的眼前會浮現此生往事。隨後，你有足夠的時間在下墜過程中反思每一絲悔恨。

cards.originalText: Destroy target creature. Consign to the Pit deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

cards.name: Cry of the Carnarium
cards.text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Exile all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
cards.flavor: If your ears bleed, it's a party. If your eyes bleed, it's a Rakdos party.

rulings.text: Cry of the Carnarium’s power-and-toughness-reducing effect affects only creatures on the battlefield at the time it resolves. Creatures that enter the battlefield later in the turn won’t get -2/-2.
Cry of the Carnarium’s replacement effect affects any creature that would die in the turn, even creatures not on the battlefield as it resolves.

Creatures that would die after getting -2/-2 will still be on the battlefield when cards are exiled from graveyards. They won’t die, and will instead be exiled after Cry of the Carnarium is entirely finished resolving.

foreignNames.name: Geheul der Schlachtstätte
foreignNames.text: Alle Kreaturen erhalten -2/-2 bis zum Ende des Zuges. Schicke alle Kreaturenkarten aus allen Friedhöfen ins Exil, die in diesen Zug aus dem Spiel dorthin gelegt wurden. Falls eine Kreatur in diesem Zug sterben würde, schicke sie stattdessen ins Exil.
foreignNames.flavor: Wenn deine Ohren bluten, ist es eine Party. Wenn eine Augen bluten, ist es eine Rakdos-Party.

foreignNames.name: Bramido del carnarium
foreignNames.text: Todas las criaturas obtienen -2/-2 hasta el final del turno. Exilia todas las cartas de criatura en todos los cementerios que hayan ido allí desde el campo de batalla este turno. Si una criatura fuera a morir este turno, en vez de eso, exíliala.
foreignNames.flavor: Si te sangran los oídos, es una fiesta. Si te sangran los ojos, es una fiesta rakdos.

foreignNames.name: Cri du carnarium
foreignNames.text: Toutes les créatures gagnent -2/-2 jusqu'à la fin du tour. Exilez toutes les cartes de créature de tous les cimetières qui y ont été mises, ce tour-ci, depuis le champ de bataille. Si une créature devait mourir ce tour-ci, exilez-la à la place.
foreignNames.flavor: Si vos oreilles saignent, c'est une fête. Si vos yeux saignent, c'est une fête de Rakdos.

foreignNames.name: Grido del Carnario
foreignNames.text: Tutte le creature prendono -2/-2 fino alla fine del turno. Esilia tutte le carte creatura in tutti i cimiteri che vi sono state messe dal campo di battaglia in questo turno. Se una creatura sta per morire in questo turno, invece esiliala.
foreignNames.flavor: Se ti sanguinano le orecchie, è una festa degna di questo nome. Se ti sanguinano gli occhi, è una festa degna dei Rakdos.

foreignNames.name: 肉儀場の叫び
foreignNames.text: ターン終了時まで、クリーチャーはすべて－２/－２の修整を受ける。墓地にあって、このターンに戦場からその墓地に置かれたクリーチャー・カードをすべて追放する。このターンにクリーチャーが死亡するなら、代わりにそれを追放する。
foreignNames.flavor: 耳が潰れるなら、それは祭りだ。目が潰れるなら、それはラクドスの祭りだ。

foreignNames.name: 카르나리움의 울음소리
foreignNames.text: 모든 생물은 턴종료까지 -2/-2를 받는다. 모든 무덤에 있는 카드들 중 이 턴에 전장에서 무덤으로 간 생물 카드를 모두 추방한다. 이 턴에 생물이 죽으려고 하면, 대신 그 생물을 추방한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 귀에서 피가 나면, 그건 축제다. 눈에서 피가 나면, 그건 락도스의 축제다.

foreignNames.name: Grito do Carnarium
foreignNames.text: Todas as criaturas recebem -2/-2 até o final do turno. Exile todos os cards de criatura de todos os cemitérios que foram colocados lá vindos do campo de batalha neste turno. Se uma criatura morreria neste turno, em vez disso, exile-a.
foreignNames.flavor: Se suas orelhas sangram, é uma festa. Se seus olhos sangram, é uma festa dos Rakdos.

foreignNames.name: Рев Карнариума
foreignNames.text: Все существа получают -2/-2 до конца хода. Изгоните все карты существ из всех кладбищ, которые попали туда с поля битвы в этом ходу. Если существо должно умереть в этом ходу, изгоните его вместо этого.
foreignNames.flavor: Когда из ушей течет кровь, это гулянка. Когда кровь течет из глаз, это гулянка Ракдосов.

foreignNames.name: 剜祭场呼喊
foreignNames.text: 所有生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。放逐所有坟墓场中的所有于本回合中从战场进入该处之生物牌。如果本回合中有生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。
foreignNames.flavor: 如果耳朵流血，这是场普通派对。如果眼睛流血，这是场拉铎司派对。

foreignNames.name: 剜祭場呼喊
foreignNames.text: 所有生物得-2/-2直到回合結束。放逐所有墳墓場中的所有於本回合中從戰場進入該處之生物牌。如果本回合中有生物將死去，則改為將它放逐。
foreignNames.flavor: 如果耳朵流血，這是場普通派對。如果眼睛流血，這是場拉鐸司派對。

cards.originalText: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Exile all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.name: Dead Revels
cards.text:
Spectacle {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: You're only as dead as you feel.

rulings.text: Damage dealt to a player causes that player to lose that much life.

Spectacle doesn’t change when you can cast the card. For example, you can’t cast a sorcery with spectacle during an opponent’s turn unless another effect allows you to do so, even if that player has lost life this turn.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying (such as a spectacle cost), add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
A card’s spectacle cost is the same no matter how much life your opponents lost or how many opponents lost life.

In a multiplayer game, if an opponent loses life and later that turn leaves the game, you can cast a spell for its spectacle cost. (If a player leaves the game during their turn, that turn continues without an active player.)

foreignNames.name: Todesgenuss
foreignNames.text:
Spektakel {1}{B} (Du kannst diesen Zauberspruch für seine Spektakel-Kosten anstelle seiner Manakosten wirken, falls ein Gegner in diesem Zug Lebenspunkte verloren hat.)
Bringe bis zu zwei Kreaturenkarten deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Du bist nur so tot, wie du dich fühlst.

foreignNames.name: Jarana de los muertos
foreignNames.text:
Espectáculo {1}{B}. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo por su coste de espectáculo en vez de por su coste de maná si un oponente perdió vidas este turno.)
Regresa hasta dos cartas de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor: Solo estás tan muerto como te sientes.

foreignNames.name: Festivités des morts
foreignNames.text:
Spectacle {1}{B} (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort pour son coût de spectacle à la place de son coût de mana si un adversaire a perdu des points de vie ce tour-ci.)
Renvoyez jusqu'à deux cartes de créature ciblées depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
foreignNames.flavor: La mort, c'est uniquement dans la tête.

foreignNames.name: Festival dei Morti
foreignNames.text:
Spettacolo {1}{B} (Puoi lanciare questa magia per il suo costo di spettacolo invece del suo costo di mana se un avversario ha perso punti vita in questo turno.)
Riprendi in mano fino a due carte creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: È davvero morto solo chi si sente morto.

foreignNames.name: 死の歓楽
foreignNames.text:
絢爛{1}{B}（このターンに対戦相手がライフを失っていたなら、あなたはこの呪文を、これのマナ・コストではなく絢爛コストで唱えてもよい。）
あなたの墓地からクリーチャー・カード最大２枚を対象とし、それらをあなたの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 死んでいるかどうかは、気持ち次第。

foreignNames.name: 망자의 축제
foreignNames.text:
구경거리 {1}{B} (상대가 이 턴에 생명점을 잃었다면 당신은 이 주문을 마나 비용 대신 구경거리 비용으로 발동할 수 있다.)
당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드를 최대 두 장까지 목표로 정한다. 그 카드들을 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 죽음이란 건 느끼기 나름이다.

foreignNames.name: Farristas Mortos
foreignNames.text:
Espetáculo {1}{B} (Você pode conjurar esta mágica por seu custo de espetáculo, em vez de seu custo de mana, se um oponente perdeu pontos de vida neste turno.)
Devolva até dois cards de criatura alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor: Você só está morto quando se sente morto.

foreignNames.name: Разгул Мертвецов
foreignNames.text:
Зрелище {1}{B} (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание за его стоимость Зрелища вместо его мана-стоимости, если оппонент терял жизнь(-и) в этом ходу.)
Верните не более двух целевых карт существ из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
foreignNames.flavor: Ты мертв лишь настолько, на сколько себя чувствуешь.

foreignNames.name: 亡者狂欢
foreignNames.text:
揭幕{1}{B}（如果本回合有对手曾失去生命，则你可以支付此咒语的揭幕费用而非法术力费用来施放它。）
将至多两张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 等到自己觉得没劲的时候，才是真的死了。

foreignNames.name: 亡者狂歡
foreignNames.text:
揭幕{1}{B}（如果本回合有對手曾失去生命，則你可以支付此咒語的揭幕費用而非魔法力費用來施放它。）
將至多兩張目標生物牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 等到自己覺得沒勁的時候，才是真的死了。

cards.originalText:
Spectacle {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Debtors' Transport
cards.text: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)
cards.flavor: By design, the sarcophagus muffles the debtors' moans but does not silence them.

rulings.text: Because blockers are chosen all at once, you can’t block with a creature with afterlife, wait for it to die, then block with the resulting Spirit tokens.

foreignNames.name: Schuldner-Transport
foreignNames.text: Seelenwandlung 2 (Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, erzeuge zwei 1/1 weiße und schwarze Geist-Kreaturenspielsteine mit Flugfähigkeit.)
foreignNames.flavor: Der Sarkophag ist so gebaut, dass er das Jammern des Schuldners dämpft, aber nicht vollständig verstummen lässt.

foreignNames.name: Transporte de deudores
foreignNames.text: Ultratumba 2. (Cuando esta criatura muera, crea dos fichas de criatura Espíritu blancas y negras 1/1 con la habilidad de volar.)
foreignNames.flavor: El diseño del sarcófago está pensado para ahogar los gemidos de los deudores, pero no para silenciarlos del todo.

foreignNames.name: Transport des consignataires
foreignNames.text: Au-delà 2 (Quand cette créature meurt, créez deux jetons de créature 1/1 blanche et noire Esprit avec le vol.)
foreignNames.flavor: Par dessein, le sarcophage étouffe les gémissements des débiteurs mais ne les réduit pas au silence.

foreignNames.name: Trasportatore di Debitori
foreignNames.text: Aldilà 2 (Quando questa creatura muore, crea due pedine creatura Spirito 1/1 bianche e nere con volare.)
foreignNames.flavor: Il sarcofago è progettato per attutire i gemiti dei debitori, ma non per renderli completamente inudibili.

foreignNames.name: 債務者の輸送
foreignNames.text: 死後２（このクリーチャーが死亡したとき、飛行を持ち白であり黒である１/１のスピリット・クリーチャー・トークンを２体生成する。）
foreignNames.flavor: 仕様により、その棺は債務者の呻き声を抑えても、黙らせることはしない。

foreignNames.name: 채무자 수송수단
foreignNames.text: 사후세계 2 (이 생물이 죽을 때, 비행을 가진 1/1 백색 및 흑색 신령 생물 토큰 두 개를 만든다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 의도적으로, 석관들은 빚진 자들의 신음 소리를 줄여는 주지만 없애지는 않는다.

foreignNames.name: Transporte dos Devedores
foreignNames.text: Pós-vida 2 (Quando esta criatura morrer, crie duas fichas de criatura branca e preta 1/1 do tipo Espírito com voar. )
foreignNames.flavor: O sarcófago foi projetado para abafar os gemidos dos devedores, mas não os silencia.

foreignNames.name: Перевозчик Должников
foreignNames.text: Посмертие 2 (Когда это существо умирает, создайте две фишки существа 1/1 белый и черный Дух с Полетом.)
foreignNames.flavor: Саркофаг устроен так, чтобы приглушить стоны должников, но не заглушать полностью.

foreignNames.name: 负债者驮兽
foreignNames.text: 往生2（当此生物死去时，派出两个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。）
foreignNames.flavor: 石椁设计上就只是为了盖过负债者的呻吟声，而不是将其彻底消除。

foreignNames.name: 負債者馱獸
foreignNames.text: 往生2（當此生物死去時，派出兩個1/1，白黑雙色，具飛行異能的精靈衍生生物。）
foreignNames.flavor: 石槨設計上就只是為了蓋過負債者的呻吟聲，而不是將其徹底消除。

cards.originalText: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

cards.name: Drill Bit
cards.text:
Spectacle {B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor: Never boring.

rulings.text: Damage dealt to a player causes that player to lose that much life.

Spectacle doesn’t change when you can cast the card. For example, you can’t cast a sorcery with spectacle during an opponent’s turn unless another effect allows you to do so, even if that player has lost life this turn.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying (such as a spectacle cost), add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
A card’s spectacle cost is the same no matter how much life your opponents lost or how many opponents lost life.

In a multiplayer game, if an opponent loses life and later that turn leaves the game, you can cast a spell for its spectacle cost. (If a player leaves the game during their turn, that turn continues without an active player.)

foreignNames.name: Bohreinsatz
foreignNames.text:
Spektakel {B} (Du kannst diesen Zauberspruch für seine Spektakel-Kosten anstelle seiner Manakosten wirken, falls ein Gegner in diesem Zug Lebenspunkte verloren hat.)
Ein Spieler deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du bestimmst davon eine Nichtland-Karte. Der Spieler wirft die bestimmte Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: Da müssen wir wohl nachbohren.

foreignNames.name: El número del taladro
foreignNames.text:
Espectáculo {B}. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo por su coste de espectáculo en vez de por su coste de maná si un oponente perdió vidas este turno.)
El jugador objetivo muestra su mano. Tú eliges de ahí una carta que no sea tierra. Ese jugador descarta esa carta.
foreignNames.flavor: ¡Te hará perder la cabeza!

foreignNames.name: Mèche
foreignNames.text:
Spectacle {B} (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort pour son coût de spectacle à la place de son coût de mana si un adversaire a perdu des points de vie ce tour-ci.)
Le joueur ciblé révèle sa main. Vous y choisissez une carte non-terrain. Ce joueur se défausse de cette carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Comment percer dans le spectacle.

foreignNames.name: Numero del Trapano
foreignNames.text:
Spettacolo {B} (Puoi lanciare questa magia per il suo costo di spettacolo invece del suo costo di mana se un avversario ha perso punti vita in questo turno.)
Un giocatore bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta non terra da quella mano. Quel giocatore scarta quella carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Un'esibizione che ti resta in testa.

foreignNames.name: ドリルビット
foreignNames.text:
絢爛{B}（このターンに対戦相手がライフを失っていたなら、あなたはこの呪文を、これのマナ・コストではなく絢爛コストで唱えてもよい。）
プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中から土地でないカード１枚を選ぶ。そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。
foreignNames.flavor: 日程に穴は開いていない。

foreignNames.name: 드릴용 날
foreignNames.text:
구경거리 {B} (상대가 이 턴에 생명점을 잃었다면 당신은 이 주문을 마나 비용 대신 구경거리 비용으로 발동할 수 있다.)
플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 손을 공개한다. 그중 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 선택한다. 그 플레이어는 그 카드를 버린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 지루할 일이 없다.

foreignNames.name: Número da Broca
foreignNames.text:
Espetáculo {B} (Você pode conjurar esta mágica por seu custo de espetáculo, em vez de seu custo de mana, se um oponente perdeu pontos de vida neste turno.)
O jogador alvo revela a própria mão. Você escolhe um card que não seja um terreno da mão dele. Aquele jogador descarta aquele card.
foreignNames.flavor: Esse é de perder a cabeça!

foreignNames.name: Сверло Дрели
foreignNames.text:
Зрелище {B} (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание за его стоимость Зрелища вместо его мана-стоимости, если оппонент терял жизнь(-и) в этом ходу.)
Целевой игрок показывает свою руку. Вы выбираете из нее карту, не являющуюся землей. Тот игрок сбрасывает ту карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Зубодробительная штука.

foreignNames.name: 凿灵作乐
foreignNames.text:
揭幕{B}（如果本回合有对手曾失去生命，则你可以支付此咒语的揭幕费用而非法术力费用来施放它。）
目标牌手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非地牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 绝无冷场。

foreignNames.name: 鑿靈作樂
foreignNames.text:
揭幕{B}（如果本回合有對手曾失去生命，則你可以支付此咒語的揭幕費用而非魔法力費用來施放它。）
目標玩家展示其手牌。你選擇其中一張非地牌。該玩家棄掉該牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 絕無冷場。

cards.originalText:
Spectacle {B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Font of Agonies
cards.text:
Whenever you pay life, put that many blood counters on Font of Agonies.
{1}{B}, Remove four blood counters from Font of Agonies: Destroy target creature.
cards.flavor:
"No worthwhile reward is easily gained."
—Nicol Bolas

rulings.text: The first ability of Font of Agonies is a triggered ability, not an activated ability. It doesn’t allow you to pay life whenever you want; rather, you need some other way of paying life, such as with Blood Crypt’s ability.
An effect that causes you to pay life uses the word “pay.” If an effect allows you to choose to lose life or to be dealt damage without using the word “pay,” you’re not paying life.

foreignNames.name: Quell des Schmerzes
foreignNames.text:
Immer wenn du Lebenspunkte bezahlst, lege entsprechend viele Blutmarken auf den Quell des Schmerzes.
{1}{B}, entferne vier Blutmarken vom Quell des Schmerzes: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Kein lohnender Preis ist leicht verdient."
—Nicol Bolas

foreignNames.name: Fuente de agonías
foreignNames.text:
Siempre que pagues vidas, pon esa misma cantidad de contadores de sangre sobre la Fuente de agonías.
{1}{B}, remover cuatro contadores de sangre de la Fuente de agonías: Destruye la criatura objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Ninguna recompensa que valga la pena se obtiene fácilmente".
—Nicol Bolas

foreignNames.name: Fontaine des agonies
foreignNames.text:
À chaque fois que vous payez des points de vie, mettez autant de marqueurs « sang » sur la Fontaine des agonies.
{1}{B}, retirez quatre marqueurs « sang » de la Fontaine des agonies : Détruisez une créature ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Une récompense qui en vaut la peine ne s'obtient jamais facilement. »
—Nicol Bolas

foreignNames.name: Fonte di Agonie
foreignNames.text:
Ogniqualvolta paghi punti vita, metti altrettanti segnalini sangue sulla Fonte di Agonie.
{1}{B}, Rimuovi quattro segnalini sangue dalla Fonte di Agonie: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Nessuna ricompensa degna di questo nome si ottiene facilmente."
—Nicol Bolas

foreignNames.name: 苦悶の泉
foreignNames.text:
あなたがライフを支払うたび、その点数に等しい数の血液カウンターを苦悶の泉の上に置く。
{1}{B}, 苦悶の泉の上から血液カウンターを４個取り除く：クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor:
「価値ある報酬は簡単には手に入らぬ。」
――ニコル・ボーラス

foreignNames.name: 고뇌의 세례반
foreignNames.text:
당신이 생명점을 지불할 때마다, 고뇌의 세례반에 피 카운터를 그만큼 올려놓는다.
{1}{B}, 고뇌의 세례반에서 피 카운터 네 개를 제거한다: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"가치 있는 보상은 쉽게 얻을 수 없는 법이지."
—니콜 볼라스

foreignNames.name: Fonte das Agonias
foreignNames.text:
Toda vez que você pagar pontos de vida, coloque aquela quantidade de marcadores de sangue em Fonte das Agonias.
{1}{B}, remova quatro marcadores de sangue de Fonte das Agonias: Destrua a criatura alvo.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Nenhuma recompensa de valor vem facilmente."
— Nicol Bolas

foreignNames.name: Источник Мучений
foreignNames.text:
Каждый раз, когда вы платите жизнь(-и), положите такое же количество жетонов крови на Источник Мучений.
{1}{B}, удалите четыре жетона крови с Источника Мучений: уничтожьте целевое существо.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Ничего по-настоящему ценного нельзя получить без усилий».
— Никол Болас

foreignNames.name: 苦痛洗礼盘
foreignNames.text:
每当你支付生命时，在苦痛洗礼盘上放置等量的鲜血指示物。
{1}{B}，从苦痛洗礼盘上移去四个鲜血指示物：消灭目标生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「珍贵回报绝无可能唾手而得。」
～尼可波拉斯

foreignNames.name: 苦痛洗禮盤
foreignNames.text:
每當你支付生命時，在苦痛洗禮盤上放置等量的鮮血指示物。
{1}{B}，從苦痛洗禮盤上移去四個鮮血指示物：消滅目標生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「珍貴回報絕無可能唾手而得。」
～尼可波拉斯

cards.originalText:
Whenever you pay life, put that many blood counters on Font of Agonies.
{1}{B}, Remove four blood counters from Font of Agonies: Destroy target creature.

cards.name: Grotesque Demise
cards.text: Exile target creature with power 3 or less.
cards.flavor:
"A debtor's soul has little value, except as a warning to others who might consider defaulting on their loans."
—Ubea, Orzhov ministrant

foreignNames.name: Groteskes Ableben
foreignNames.text: Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl mit Stärke 3 oder weniger ins Exil.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Die Seele eines Schuldners ist wenig wert, aber sie kann anderen als Warnung dienen, die ihre Schulden nicht ernst genug nehmen."
—Ubea, Orzhov-Messdienerin

foreignNames.name: Deceso grotesco
foreignNames.text: Exilia la criatura objetivo con fuerza de 3 o menos.
foreignNames.flavor:
"El alma de un deudor no vale mucho, excepto como advertencia para aquellos que estén considerando no pagar sus préstamos".
—Ubea, ministrante orzhov

foreignNames.name: Décès grotesque
foreignNames.text: Exilez la créature ciblée de force inférieure ou égale à 3.
foreignNames.flavor:
« L'âme d'un débiteur n'a que peu de valeur, sinon d'avertir ceux qui songeraient à ne pas rembourser leurs dettes. »
—Ubéa, ministre d'Orzhov

foreignNames.name: Dipartita Grottesca
foreignNames.text: Esilia una creatura bersaglio con forza pari o inferiore a 3.
foreignNames.flavor:
"L'anima di un debitore è di scarso valore, se non come monito agli altri che potrebbero essere tentati di non ripagare un prestito."
—Ubea, officiante Orzhov

foreignNames.name: 奇怪な死
foreignNames.text: パワーが３以下のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを追放する。
foreignNames.flavor:
「債務者の魂に大した価値はない。債務の不履行を考えている者への見せしめとして以外はね。」
――オルゾフの聖職者、ウベア

foreignNames.name: 끔찍한 종말
foreignNames.text: 공격력이 3 이하인 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 추방한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"빚진 자의 영혼은 채무를 불이행하려고 생각하는 자들에게 경고하는 것 이외에는 가치가 별로 없다네."
—오르조브 보좌관, 우베아

foreignNames.name: Fim Grotesco
foreignNames.text: Exile a criatura alvo com poder igual ou inferior a 3.
foreignNames.flavor:
"A alma de um devedor tem pouco valor, a não ser como aviso a outros que possam cogitar a inadimplência."
— Ubea, ministrante Orzhov

foreignNames.name: Гротескная Гибель
foreignNames.text: Изгоните целевое существо с силой 3 или меньше.
foreignNames.flavor:
«От души должника мало толку — она может служить разве что предостережением для тех, кто не хочет платить по кредиту».
— Юбея, богослужительница Орзовов

foreignNames.name: 怪诞夺命
foreignNames.text: 放逐目标力量等于或小于3的生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「负债者的灵魂毫无价值，不过倒是可以拿来以儆效尤，吓唬那些想要赖帐的人。」
～欧佐夫主礼人尤蓓

foreignNames.name: 怪誕奪命
foreignNames.text: 放逐目標力量等於或小於3的生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「負債者的靈魂毫無價值，不過倒是可以拿來以儆傚尤，嚇唬那些想要賴帳的人。」
～歐佐夫主禮人尤蓓

cards.originalText: Exile target creature with power 3 or less.

cards.name: Gutterbones
cards.text:
Gutterbones enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}{B}: Return Gutterbones from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your turn and only if an opponent lost life this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Down here, things don't stay dead."
—Lavinia

rulings.text: Damage dealt to a player causes that player to lose that much life.
In a multiplayer game, if an opponent loses life during your turn and then leaves the game, you can activate Gutterbones’s ability.

foreignNames.name: Gossenknochen
foreignNames.text:
Der Gossenknochen kommt getappt ins Spiel.
{1}{B}: Bringe den Gossenknochen aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur während deines Zuges und nur, falls ein Gegner in diesem Zug Lebenspunkte verloren hat.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Hier unten bleibt nichts tot."
—Lavinia

foreignNames.name: Cloacahuesos
foreignNames.text:
El Cloacahuesos entra al campo de batalla girado.
{1}{B}: Regresa el Cloacahuesos de tu cementerio a tu mano. Activa esta habilidad solo durante tu turno y solo si un oponente perdió vidas este turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Aquí abajo, las cosas no permanecen muertas".
—Lavinia

foreignNames.name: Carcasse des égouts
foreignNames.text:
La Carcasse des égouts arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
{1}{B} : Renvoyez la Carcasse des égouts depuis votre cimetière dans votre main. N'activez cette capacité que pendant votre tour et que si un adversaire a perdu des points de vie ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Ici-bas, rien ne reste mort. »
—Lavinia

foreignNames.name: Scheletro delle Fogne
foreignNames.text:
Lo Scheletro delle Fogne entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
{1}{B}: Riprendi in mano lo Scheletro delle Fogne dal tuo cimitero. Attiva questa abilità solo durante il tuo turno e solo se un avversario ha perso punti vita in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Qua sotto, niente resta morto."
—Lavinia

foreignNames.name: どぶ骨
foreignNames.text:
どぶ骨はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{1}{B}：あなたの墓地からどぶ骨をあなたの手札に戻す。この能力は、あなたのターン中で、このターンに対戦相手がライフを失っていたときにのみ起動できる。
foreignNames.flavor:
「ここにあるものは、いつまでも死んだままではいてくれないわ。」
――ラヴィニア

foreignNames.name: 시궁창해골
foreignNames.text:
시궁창해골은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{1}{B}: 시궁창해골을 당신의 무덤에서 당신의 손으로 되돌린다. 이 능력은 상대가 생명점을 잃은 당신의 턴에만 활성화할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"이 아래에서는, 그냥 죽은 채로 있는 것이 없지."
—라비니아

foreignNames.name: Esqueleto da Sarjeta
foreignNames.text:
Esqueleto da Sarjeta entra no campo de batalha virado.
{1}{B}: Devolva Esqueleto da Sarjeta de seu cemitério para sua mão. Ative esta habilidade somente durante o seu turno e apenas se um oponente perdeu pontos de vida neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Aqui embaixo nada permanece morto."
— Lavínia

foreignNames.name: Сточный Костяк
foreignNames.text:
Сточный Костяк выходит на поле битвы повернутым.
{1}{B}: верните Сточный Костяк из вашего кладбища в вашу руку. Активируйте эту способность только во время вашего хода, и только если оппонент терял жизнь(-и) в этом ходу.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Здесь, внизу, никто не залеживается в мертвецах».
— Лавиния

foreignNames.name: 水沟骷髅妖
foreignNames.text:
水沟骷髅妖须横置进战场。
{1}{B}：将水沟骷髅妖从你的坟墓场移回你的手上。只能在你的回合中起动此异能，且只有于本回合中有对手曾失去生命时才能起动。
foreignNames.flavor:
「在这底下，死掉的东西可不安分。」
～拉温妮

foreignNames.name: 水溝骷髏妖
foreignNames.text:
水溝骷髏妖須橫置進戰場。
{1}{B}：將水溝骷髏妖從你的墳墓場移回你的手上。只能在你的回合中起動此異能，且只有於本回合中有對手曾失去生命時才能起動。
foreignNames.flavor:
「在這底下，死掉的東西可不安分。」
～拉溫妮

cards.originalText:
Gutterbones enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}{B}: Return Gutterbones from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your turn and only if an opponent lost life this turn.

cards.name: Ill-Gotten Inheritance
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Ill-Gotten Inheritance deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
{5}{B}, Sacrifice Ill-Gotten Inheritance: It deals 4 damage to target opponent and you gain 4 life.
cards.flavor: "The suffering of others is not my concern."

rulings.text: In a Two-Headed Giant game, Ill-Gotten Inheritance’s first ability causes the opposing team to lose 2 life and you gain 1 life.

foreignNames.name: Unrechtmäßiges Erbe
foreignNames.text:
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments fügt das Unrechtmäßige Erbe jedem Gegner 1 Schadenspunkt zu und du erhältst 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.
{5}{B}, opfere das Unrechtmäßige Erbe: Es fügt einem Gegner deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu und du erhältst 4 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Das Leiden der anderen interessiert mich nicht."

foreignNames.name: Herencia ilícita
foreignNames.text:
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, la Herencia ilícita hace 1 punto de daño a cada oponente y tú ganas 1 vida.
{5}{B}, sacrificar la Herencia ilícita: Hace 4 puntos de daño al oponente objetivo y tú ganas 4 vidas.
foreignNames.flavor: "El sufrimiento de otros no es asunto mío".

foreignNames.name: Héritage mal acquis
foreignNames.text:
Au début de votre entretien, l'Héritage mal acquis inflige 1 blessure à chaque adversaire et vous gagnez 1 point de vie.
{5}{B}, sacrifiez l'Héritage mal acquis : Il inflige 4 blessures à un adversaire ciblé et vous gagnez 4 points de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: « Je n'ai que faire de la souffrance des autres. »

foreignNames.name: Eredità Illecita
foreignNames.text:
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, l'Eredità Illecita infligge 1 danno a ogni avversario e tu guadagni 1 punto vita.
{5}{B}, Sacrifica l'Eredità Illecita: Infligge 4 danni a un avversario bersaglio e tu guadagni 4 punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor: "La sofferenza altrui non è un mio problema."

foreignNames.name: 不正相続
foreignNames.text:
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、不正相続は各対戦相手にそれぞれ１点のダメージを与え、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
{5}{B}, 不正相続を生け贄に捧げる：対戦相手１人を対象とする。不正相続はそれに４点のダメージを与え、あなたは４点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 「他人の苦しみなど私には関係ない。」

foreignNames.name: 부정하게 얻은 유산
foreignNames.text:
당신의 유지단 시작에, 부정하게 얻은 유산은 각 상대에게 피해 1점을 입히고 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.
{5}{B}, 부정하게 얻은 유산을 희생한다: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 부정하게 얻은 유산은 그 플레이어에게 피해 4점을 입히고 당신은 생명 4점을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "다른 이들이 고통받는 건 내 알 바가 아니지."

foreignNames.name: Herança Ilícita
foreignNames.text:
No início de sua manutenção, Herança Ilícita causa 1 ponto de dano a cada oponente e você ganha 1 ponto de vida.
{5}{B}, sacrifique Herança Ilícita: Ela causa 4 pontos de dano ao oponente alvo e você ganha 4 pontos de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: "O sofrimento alheio não me diz respeito."

foreignNames.name: Преступное Наследство
foreignNames.text:
В начале вашего шага поддержки Преступное Наследство наносит 1 повреждение каждому оппоненту, а вы получаете 1 жизнь.
{5}{B}, пожертвуйте Преступное Наследство: оно наносит 4 повреждения целевому оппоненту, а вы получаете 4 жизни.
foreignNames.flavor: «Страдания других меня не касаются».

foreignNames.name: 不当遗产
foreignNames.text:
在你的维持开始时，不当遗产向每位对手各造成1点伤害且你获得1点生命。
{5}{B}，牺牲不当遗产：它向目标对手造成4点伤害且你获得4点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 「别人是否受罪与我无关。」

foreignNames.name: 不當遺產
foreignNames.text:
在你的維持開始時，不當遺產向每位對手各造成1點傷害且你獲得1點生命。
{5}{B}，犧牲不當遺產：它向目標對手造成4點傷害且你獲得4點生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 「別人是否受罪與我無關。」

cards.originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Ill-Gotten Inheritance deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
{5}{B}, Sacrifice Ill-Gotten Inheritance: It deals 4 damage to target opponent and you gain 4 life.

cards.name: Noxious Groodion
cards.text: Deathtouch
cards.flavor:
"Behold the groodion! Ichor-slurper, oozing fiend. Foulest wonder underground. Grandest vermin of them all!"
—Zalin the Gutter Bard

foreignNames.name: Todbringendes Groodion
foreignNames.text: Todesberührung
foreignNames.flavor:
„Erzittert vor dem Groodion! Eiterschlürfer, triefender Unhold. Widerlichstes Wunder im Untergrund. Größtes aller Ungeziefer!"
—Zalin der Gossenbarde

foreignNames.name: Grudion tóxico
foreignNames.text: Toque mortal.
foreignNames.flavor:
"¡Contemplen al grudion, señores! Diablo viscoso, vampiro de icor. La maravilla más repugnante bajo tierra. ¡La alimaña más maravillosa de todas!".
—Zalin, el bardo grosero

foreignNames.name: Groudion délétère
foreignNames.text: Contact mortel
foreignNames.flavor:
« Gare au groudion ! Buveur d'ichor, monstre suintant. Infâme miracle des souterrains. La plus grande vermine du monde ! »
—Zalin le barde de gouttière

foreignNames.name: Grodionte Tossico
foreignNames.text: Tocco letale
foreignNames.flavor:
"Ammirate il grodionte! Divoratore d'icore, demone grondante, la più obbrobriosa meraviglia del mondo sepolto, il più grande parassita mai esistito!"
—Zalin, il Bardo dei Bassifondi

foreignNames.name: 有毒グルーディオン
foreignNames.text: 接死
foreignNames.flavor:
「グルーディオンを見よ！膿垂らしの湿った悪鬼。地底で最も汚れた存在。害獣の中の害獣！」
――どぶ詩人ゼーリン

foreignNames.name: 해로운 그루디온
foreignNames.text: 치명타
foreignNames.flavor:
"그루디온을 보라! 핏물을 들이키며, 진액을 흘리고 다니는 악마를. 지하에서 가장 불경한 신비일지니. 모든 이들 중 가장 장엄한 해충이어라!"
 —시궁창 음유시인 잘린

foreignNames.name: Groodion Nocivo
foreignNames.text: Toque mortífero
foreignNames.flavor:
"Contemplem o groodion! Sorvedor icorídeo, demônio gosmento. Maravilha mais torpe do subterrâneo. Maior de todas as pragas!"
— Zalin, o bardo da sarjeta

foreignNames.name: Заразный Грудион
foreignNames.text: Смертельное касание
foreignNames.flavor:
«Узрите же грудиона! Изрыгающий жижу слизистый демон. Мерзейшее из чудовищ под землей. Величайший паразит из всех!»
— Залин, сточный бард

foreignNames.name: 恶毒古汀兽
foreignNames.text: 死触
foreignNames.flavor:
「瞧瞧这头古汀兽！吞吐脓水的恶鬼。地底城最污劣的奇观。世间最毒的病媒！」
～贫窟吟游诗人翟林

foreignNames.name: 惡毒古汀獸
foreignNames.text: 死觸
foreignNames.flavor:
「瞧瞧這頭古汀獸！吞吐膿水的惡鬼。地底城最污劣的奇觀。世間最毒的病媒！」
～貧窟吟遊詩人翟林

cards.originalText: Deathtouch

cards.name: Orzhov Enforcer
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)
cards.flavor: "You'll pay what you owe, with your money or your life."

rulings.text: Because blockers are chosen all at once, you can’t block with a creature with afterlife, wait for it to die, then block with the resulting Spirit tokens.

foreignNames.name: Orzhov-Vollstreckerin
foreignNames.text:
Todesberührung
Seelenwandlung 1 (Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, erzeuge einen 1/1 weißen und schwarzen Geist-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Du wirst bezahlen, was du schuldest — entweder mit Geld, oder mit deinem Leben."

foreignNames.name: Ejecutora orzhov
foreignNames.text:
Toque mortal.
Ultratumba 1. (Cuando esta criatura muera, crea una ficha de criatura Espíritu blanca y negra 1/1 con la habilidad de volar.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Pagarás lo que debes, con tu dinero o con tu vida".

foreignNames.name: Argousin d'Orzhov
foreignNames.text:
Contact mortel
Au-delà 1 (Quand cette créature meurt, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche et noire Esprit avec le vol.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Vous paierez votre dette, avec votre argent ou votre vie. »

foreignNames.name: Esecutrice Orzhov
foreignNames.text:
Tocco letale
Aldilà 1 (Quando questa creatura muore, crea una pedina creatura Spirito 1/1 bianca e nera con volare.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Pagherai i tuoi debiti, con il denaro o con la vita."

foreignNames.name: オルゾフの処罰者
foreignNames.text:
接死
死後１（このクリーチャーが死亡したとき、飛行を持ち白であり黒である１/１のスピリット・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「借りは返すことになる。金銭あるいは命によって。」

foreignNames.name: 오르조브 집행자
foreignNames.text:
치명타
사후세계 1 (이 생물이 죽을 때, 비행을 가진 1/1 백색 및 흑색 신령 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.)
foreignNames.flavor: "빚진 건 지불하게 될 거다, 돈으로든 목숨으로든."

foreignNames.name: Impositora Orzhov
foreignNames.text:
Toque mortífero
Pós-vida 1 (Quando esta criatura morrer, crie uma ficha de criatura branca e preta 1/1 do tipo Espírito com voar.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Você vai pagar o que deve, com dinheiro ou com a vida."

foreignNames.name: Блюстительница Орзовов
foreignNames.text:
Смертельное касание
Посмертие 1 (Когда это существо умирает, создайте одну фишку существа 1/1 белый и черный Дух с Полетом.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Ты заплатишь то, что должен, — золотом или жизнью».

foreignNames.name: 欧佐夫执法者
foreignNames.text:
死触
往生1（当此生物死去时，派出一个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「欠下的债都得还，用钱用命都可以。」

foreignNames.name: 歐佐夫執法者
foreignNames.text:
死觸
往生1（當此生物死去時，派出一個1/1，白黑雙色，具飛行異能的精靈衍生生物。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「欠下的債都得還，用錢用命都可以。」

cards.originalText:
Deathtouch
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

cards.name: Orzhov Racketeers
cards.text:
Whenever Orzhov Racketeers deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)
cards.flavor: "Looks like you need protection."

rulings.text: Because blockers are chosen all at once, you can’t block with a creature with afterlife, wait for it to die, then block with the resulting Spirit tokens.

foreignNames.name: Orzhov-Erpresser
foreignNames.text:
Immer wenn die Orzhov-Erpresser einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügen, wirft der Spieler eine Karte ab.
Seelenwandlung 2 (Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, erzeuge zwei 1/1 weiße und schwarze Geist-Kreaturenspielsteine mit Flugfähigkeit.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Du willst doch sicher nicht, dass dir was passiert."

foreignNames.name: Chantajistas orzhov
foreignNames.text:
Siempre que los Chantajistas orzhov hagan daño de combate a un jugador, ese jugador descarta una carta.
Ultratumba 2. (Cuando esta criatura muera, crea dos fichas de criatura Espíritu blancas y negras 1/1 con la habilidad de volar.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Se diría que necesitas protección".

foreignNames.name: Racketteurs d'Orzhov
foreignNames.text:
À chaque fois que les Racketteurs d'Orzhov infligent des blessures de combat à un joueur, ce joueur se défausse d'une carte.
Au-delà 2 (Quand cette créature meurt, créez deux jetons de créature 1/1 blanche et noire Esprit avec le vol.)
foreignNames.flavor: « On dirait que vous avez besoin d'une protection. »

foreignNames.name: Estorsori Orzhov
foreignNames.text:
Ogniqualvolta gli Estorsori Orzhov infliggono danno da combattimento a un giocatore, quel giocatore scarta una carta.
Aldilà 2 (Quando questa creatura muore, crea due pedine creatura Spirito 1/1 bianche e nere con volare.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Sembra che tu abbia bisogno di protezione."

foreignNames.name: オルゾフの強請り屋
foreignNames.text:
オルゾフの強請り屋がプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、そのプレイヤーはカード１枚を捨てる。
死後２（このクリーチャーが死亡したとき、飛行を持ち白であり黒である１/１のスピリット・クリーチャー・トークンを２体生成する。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「自分の身の心配をした方がいいんじゃありませんかね。」

foreignNames.name: 오르조브 협잡꾼
foreignNames.text:
오르조브 협잡꾼이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 그 플레이어는 카드 한 장을 버린다.
사후세계 2 (이 생물이 죽을 때, 비행을 가진 1/1 백색 및 흑색 신령 생물 토큰 두 개를 만든다.)
foreignNames.flavor: "너, 보호가 필요한 것처럼 보이는데."

foreignNames.name: Extorsores Orzhov
foreignNames.text:
Toda vez que Extorsores Orzhov causa dano de combate a um jogador, aquele jogador descarta um card.
Pós-vida 2 (Quando esta criatura morrer, crie duas fichas de criatura branca e preta 1/1 do tipo Espírito com voar. )
foreignNames.flavor: "Parece que você precisa de proteção."

foreignNames.name: Вымогатели Орзовов
foreignNames.text:
Каждый раз, когда Вымогатели Орзовов наносят боевые повреждения игроку, тот игрок сбрасывает карту.
Посмертие 2 (Когда это существо умирает, создайте две фишки существа 1/1 белый и черный Дух с Полетом.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Похоже, что тебе нужна защита».

foreignNames.name: 欧佐夫敲诈人
foreignNames.text:
每当欧佐夫敲诈人对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手弃一张牌。
往生2（当此生物死去时，派出两个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「你看来需要有人保护。」

foreignNames.name: 歐佐夫敲詐人
foreignNames.text:
每當歐佐夫敲詐人對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，該玩家棄一張牌。
往生2（當此生物死去時，派出兩個1/1，白黑雙色，具飛行異能的精靈衍生生物。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「你看來需要有人保護。」

cards.originalText:
Whenever Orzhov Racketeers deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

cards.name: Pestilent Spirit
cards.text:
Menace, deathtouch
Instant and sorcery spells you control have deathtouch. (Any amount of damage they deal to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor: Its stench corrodes steel. Its miasma sickens angels. Its finality ends hope.

rulings.text: An instant or sorcery spell must actually deal damage to a creature for it to be destroyed. Simply targeting a creature isn’t enough. If the spell instructs another object to deal damage, the spell doesn’t deal any damage itself and its instance of deathtouch doesn’t apply. Dealing 0 damage isn’t dealing damage.

foreignNames.name: Verseuchender Geist
foreignNames.text:
Bedrohlich, Todesberührung
Spontanzauber und Hexereien, die du kontrollierst, haben Todesberührung. (Eine beliebige Menge Schadenspunkte, die sie einer Kreatur zufügen, ist ausreichend, um diese zu zerstören.)
foreignNames.flavor: Sein Gestank zerfrisst Stahl. Sein Miasma lässt Engel erkranken. Seine Endgültigkeit nimmt jede Hoffnung.

foreignNames.name: Espíritu pestilente
foreignNames.text:
Amenaza, toque mortal.
Los hechizos de instantáneo y de conjuro que controlas tienen la habilidad de toque mortal. (Cualquier cantidad de daño que hagan a una criatura es suficiente para destruirla.)
foreignNames.flavor: Su hedor corroe el acero. Sus miasmas enferman a los ángeles. Su contundencia destruye la esperanza.

foreignNames.name: Esprit pestiféré
foreignNames.text:
Menace, contact mortel
Les sorts d'éphémère et de rituel que vous contrôlez ont le contact mortel. (Le nombre de blessures qu'ils infligent à une créature, quel qu'il soit, est suffisant pour la détruire.)
foreignNames.flavor: Sa puanteur ronge l'acier. Son miasme rend les anges malades. Son irrévocabilité anéantit l'espoir.

foreignNames.name: Spirito Pestilenziale
foreignNames.text:
Minacciare, tocco letale
Le magie istantaneo e stregoneria che controlli hanno tocco letale. (Qualsiasi danno che infliggono a una creatura è sufficiente a distruggerla.)
foreignNames.flavor: Il suo tanfo corrode l'acciaio, il suo miasma disgusta gli angeli, la sua ineluttabilità soffoca la speranza.

foreignNames.name: 死に到る霊
foreignNames.text:
威迫、接死
あなたがコントロールしていてインスタントやソーサリーである呪文は接死を持つ。（それが何らかのダメージをクリーチャーに与えたら、それだけで破壊する。）
foreignNames.flavor: その腐臭は鋼鉄を蝕む。その瘴気は天使を冒す。その終末は希望を断つ。

foreignNames.name: 질병을 퍼뜨리는 신령
foreignNames.text:
호전적, 치명타
당신이 조종하는 순간마법 및 집중마법 주문은 치명타를 가진다. (그 주문들이 생물에게 입히는 피해는 피해량에 상관없이 그 생물을 파괴한다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 그것의 악취는 철을 부식시킨다. 그것의 안개는 천사들을 병들게 한다. 그것의 결말은 희망을 종식시키는 것이다.

foreignNames.name: Espírito Pestilento
foreignNames.text:
Ameaçar, toque mortífero
As mágicas instantâneas e os feitiços que você controla têm toque mortífero. (Qualquer quantidade de dano que elas causem a uma criatura é suficiente para destruí-la.)
foreignNames.flavor: Seu ranço corrói o aço. Seu miasma nauseia os anjos. Sua finalidade acaba com a esperança.

foreignNames.name: Болезнетворный Дух
foreignNames.text:
Угроза, Смертельное касание
Мгновенные заклинания и заклинания волшебства под вашим контролем имеют Смертельное касание. (Любое количество повреждений, которое они наносят существу, достаточно, чтобы его уничтожить.)
foreignNames.flavor: Его зловоние разъедает сталь. От его испарений тошнит даже ангелов. От его бесповоротности угасает надежда.

foreignNames.name: 瘟疫精怪
foreignNames.text:
威慑，死触
由你操控的瞬间与法术咒语具有死触异能。（它们对生物造成的任何数量伤害都足以消灭后者。）
foreignNames.flavor: 腐败恶臭能让钢铁锈蚀。弥漫瘴气能令天使染疾。绝命之势将希望终结。

foreignNames.name: 瘟疫精靈
foreignNames.text:
威懾，死觸
由你操控的瞬間與巫術咒語具有死觸異能。（它們對生物造成的任何數量傷害都足以消滅後者。）
foreignNames.flavor: 腐敗惡臭能讓鋼鐵銹蝕。瀰漫瘴氣能令天使染疾。絕命之勢能將希望終結。

cards.originalText:
Menace, deathtouch
Instant and sorcery spells you control have deathtouch. (Any amount of damage they deal to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.name: Plague Wight
cards.text: Whenever Plague Wight becomes blocked, each creature blocking it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: For some goods, the best couriers are the dead.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when a creature becomes blocked triggers only once if two or more creatures block it.
If all creatures blocking Plague Wight die, Plague Wight remains blocked. It won’t assign any combat damage.
If Plague Wight leaves the battlefield while its triggered ability is on the stack, the creatures that were blocking it before it left the battlefield get -1/-1.

foreignNames.name: Seuchenstarrer
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn der Seuchenstarrer geblockt wird, erhält jede Kreatur, die ihn blockt, -1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Manche Güter werden am besten von den Toten überbracht.

foreignNames.name: Tumulario contagioso
foreignNames.text: Siempre que el Tumulario contagioso sea bloqueado, cada criatura que lo bloquee obtiene -1/-1 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Para algunas mercancías, es mejor que el transportista esté muerto.

foreignNames.name: Nécrophage de la peste
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que le Nécrophage de la peste devient bloqué, chaque créature qui le bloque gagne -1/-1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Pour certaines marchandises, les meilleurs coursiers sont les morts.

foreignNames.name: Presenza della Peste
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta la Presenza della Peste viene bloccata, ogni creatura che la blocca prende -1/-1 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Per certi carichi, i migliori corrieri sono i morti.

foreignNames.name: 疫病ワイト

rulings.text: You can activate the ability of Priest of Forgotten Gods without choosing any targets if you wish. You’ll still add {B}{B} and draw a card.
You may target players who can’t sacrifice a creature. Those players still lose 2 life.
Because it may have targets, the ability of Priest of Forgotten Gods isn’t a mana ability. It uses the stack and can be responded to, even if no targets were chosen.

cards.name: Spawn of Mayhem
cards.text:
Spectacle {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, Spawn of Mayhem deals 1 damage to each player. Then if you have 10 or less life, put a +1/+1 counter on Spawn of Mayhem.

rulings.text: If each player has 0 life after Spawn of Mayhem’s triggered ability resolves, each player loses the game at the same time and the game ends in a draw.
If Spawn of Mayhem gains lifelink, the damage it deals will cause you to simultaneously lose and gain life. If your life total is 1, you won’t lose the game.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Spawn of Mayhem’s last ability causes each team to lose 2 life. Then if your team’s life total is 10 or less, you put a +1/+1 counter on Spawn of Mayhem.
Damage dealt to a player causes that player to lose that much life.

Spectacle doesn’t change when you can cast the card. For example, you can’t cast a sorcery with spectacle during an opponent’s turn unless another effect allows you to do so, even if that player has lost life this turn.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying (such as a spectacle cost), add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
A card’s spectacle cost is the same no matter how much life your opponents lost or how many opponents lost life.

In a multiplayer game, if an opponent loses life and later that turn leaves the game, you can cast a spell for its spectacle cost. (If a player leaves the game during their turn, that turn continues without an active player.)

Fliegend, verursacht Trampelschaden

cards.name: Undercity's Embrace
cards.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you gain 4 life.
cards.flavor: The undercity is always hungry.

rulings.text: You can still gain 4 life even if the target opponent can’t sacrifice a creature.

Whether you control a creature with power 4 or greater is checked only after your opponent has sacrificed a creature. If a creature you own with power 4 or greater was exiled until the sacrificed creature left the battlefield, that creature will return to the battlefield before the check, so it will count. However, any abilities that trigger on the sacrificed creature’s death won’t have resolved yet when you check what creatures you control.
You gain only 4 life, even if you control more than one creature with power 4 or greater.

rulings.text: If Vindictive Vampire dies at the same time as one or more other creatures you control, Vindictive Vampire’s ability triggers for each of those other creatures.
If your life total is brought to 0 or less at the same time that creatures you control are dealt lethal damage, you lose the game before Vindictive Vampire’s triggered ability goes on the stack.

cards.name: Amplifire
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Until your next turn, Amplifire's base power becomes twice that card's power and its base toughness becomes twice that card's toughness. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

rulings.text: Amplifire will be a 1/1 creature from the time your untap step begins until the time its triggered ability resolves during your upkeep.

Any effects that modify Amplifire’s power and/or toughness without setting them to a specific number or value will apply after its base power and toughness are set, regardless of the order in which those effects were created. The same is true of counters that modify its power and toughness.
If you reveal your entire library and don’t reveal a creature card, Amplifire becomes a 0/0 creature and you put your library back in a random order.

foreignNames.name: Amplifeuer
foreignNames.text: Decke zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments Karten oben von deiner Bibliothek auf, bis du eine Kreaturenkarte aufdeckst. Bis zu deinem nächsten Zug wird die Basis-Stärke des Amplifeuers zum Doppelten der Stärke jener Karte und seine Basis-Widerstandskraft wird zum Doppelten der Widerstandskraft jener Karte. Lege die aufgedeckten Karten in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Amplifuego
foreignNames.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, muestra las primeras cartas de tu biblioteca hasta que muestres una carta de criatura. Hasta tu próximo turno, la fuerza base del Amplifuego se convierte en el doble de la fuerza de esa carta y su resistencia base se convierte en el doble de la resistencia de esa carta. Pon las cartas mostradas en el fondo de tu biblioteca en un orden aleatorio.

foreignNames.name: Flamplificateur
foreignNames.text: Au début de votre entretien, révélez les cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque jusqu'à ce que vous révéliez une carte de créature. Jusqu'à votre prochain tour, la force de base du Flamplificateur devient égale au double de la force de cette carte et son endurance de base devient égale au double de l'endurance de cette carte. Mettez les cartes révélées au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans un ordre aléatoire.

foreignNames.name: Amplifuoco
foreignNames.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, rivela carte dalla cima del tuo grimorio finché non riveli una carta creatura. Fino al tuo prossimo turno, la forza base dell'Amplifuoco diventa il doppio della forza di quella carta e la sua costituzione base diventa il doppio della costituzione di quella carta. Metti le carte rivelate in fondo al tuo grimorio in ordine casuale.

foreignNames.name: 倍火
foreignNames.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、クリーチャー・カードが公開されるまで、あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを１枚ずつ公開する。あなたの次のターンまで、倍火の基本のパワーはそのカードのパワーの２倍になり、これの基本のタフネスはそのカードのタフネスの２倍になる。それらの公開されたカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に無作為の順番で置く。

foreignNames.name: 증폭불길
foreignNames.text: 당신의 유지단 시작에, 생물 카드가 공개될 때까지 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드를 공개한다. 당신의 다음 턴까지, 증폭불길의 기본 공격력은 그 카드의 공격력의 두 배가 되고 기본 방어력은 그 카드의 방어력의 두 배가 된다. 공개된 카드들은 무작위 순서로 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓는다.

foreignNames.name: Amplifogo
foreignNames.text: No início de sua manutenção, revele cards do topo de seu grimório até revelar um card de criatura. Até seu próximo turno, o poder básico de Amplifogo torna-se o dobro do poder daquele card e a resistência básica de Amplifogo torna-se o dobro da resistência daquele card. Coloque os cards revelados no fundo de seu grimório em ordem aleatória.

foreignNames.name: Сверхогонь
foreignNames.text: В начале вашего шага поддержки показывайте карты с верха вашей библиотеки до тех пор, пока вы не покажете карту существа. До вашего следующего хода базовая сила Сверхогня становится равной удвоенному значению силы той карты, а его базовая выносливость — удвоенному значению выносливости той карты. Положите показанные карты в низ вашей библиотеки в случайном порядке.

foreignNames.name: 倍火妖

cards.name: Burning-Tree Vandal
cards.text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Whenever Burning-Tree Vandal attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
cards.flavor: The ostentatious splendor of the Orzhov church was just asking to be smashed.

rulings.text: Riot is a replacement effect. Players can’t respond to your choice of +1/+1 counter or haste, and they can’t take actions while the creature is on the battlefield without one or the other.
If a creature entering the battlefield has riot but can’t have a +1/+1 counter put onto it, it gains haste.
If you choose for the creature to gain haste, it gains haste indefinitely. It won’t lose it as the turn ends or as another player gains control of it.
