cards.name: Cavalcade of Calamity
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control with power 1 or less attacks, Cavalcade of Calamity deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.
cards.flavor: Let the Dimir worry about witnesses. For the Rakdos, screams count as applause.

rulings.text: A creature with power 0 or less can attack, as long as no rule or effect prohibits it from doing so. Many creatures with 0 power have defender, but not all do.

The power of the attacking creature is checked only when the ability triggers. Once it triggers, Cavalcade of Calamity will deal 1 damage to the appropriate player or planeswalker even if the creature’s power changes or the creature leaves the battlefield before the ability resolves.

If multiple creatures you control with power 1 or less attack, Cavalcade of Calamity’s ability will trigger for each of those creatures. Each ability will cause Cavalcade of Calamity to deal 1 damage to the appropriate player or planeswalker.

foreignNames.name: Unheilvoller Zirkus
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn eine Kreatur mit Stärke 1 oder weniger, die du kontrollierst, angreift, fügt der Unheilvolle Zirkus dem Spieler oder Planeswalker, den die Kreatur angreift, 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Sollen sich die Dimir mit den Zeugen herumschlagen. Für die Rakdos sind Schreie eine Art Applaus.

cards.text: When Dagger Caster enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent and 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.

foreignNames.name: 단검 투척꾼

foreignNames.flavor: "계속 와 봐. 모두에게 선사할 나이프는 충분하니까."

foreignNames.name: Lançadora de Adagas

foreignNames.name: Метательница Кинжалов

foreignNames.name: 飞刀客

cards.name: Electrodominance
cards.text: Electrodominance deals X damage to any target. You may cast a card with converted mana cost X or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
cards.flavor: "Basically, we turn a bunch of little lightnings into one big lightning."

rulings.text: If the chosen target becomes an illegal target for Electrodominance, the spell doesn’t resolve. You don’t get to cast a card from your hand.
Effects that allow you to “cast” a card don’t allow you to play a land card.

If the target is dealt lethal damage this way, it will still be on the battlefield while you cast a card from your hand. It won’t die until after Electrodominance is entirely finished resolving. If any of its abilities trigger while you cast that spell, those abilities will trigger but won’t resolve until after the target has died.
You may cast a sorcery or permanent spell this way even if it’s not your turn.

If you cast a spell “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs, such as kicker costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, such as that of Bankrupt in Blood, those must be paid to cast the card.
If a spell has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.

foreignNames.name: Elektrodominanz
foreignNames.text: Die Elektrodominanz fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl X Schadenspunkte zu. Du kannst eine Karte mit umgewandelten Manakosten von X oder weniger aus deiner Hand wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.
foreignNames.flavor: „Im Grunde machen wir aus vielen kleinen Blitzen einen richtig großen Blitz."

foreignNames.name: Electrodominación
foreignNames.text: La Electrodominación hace X puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo. Puedes lanzar una carta de tu mano con coste de maná convertido de X o menos sin pagar su coste de maná.
foreignNames.flavor: "Básicamente, convertimos un montón de rayos pequeñitos en un rayo bien gordo".

foreignNames.name: Électrodominance
foreignNames.text: L'Électrodominance inflige X blessures à n'importe quelle cible. Vous pouvez lancer une carte avec un coût converti de mana inférieur ou égal à X depuis votre main sans payer son coût de mana.
foreignNames.flavor: « En gros, nous transformons un tas de petits éclairs en un éclair géant. »

foreignNames.name: Elettrodominio
foreignNames.text: L'Elettrodominio infligge X danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio. Puoi lanciare una carta con costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a X dalla tua mano senza pagare il suo costo di mana.
foreignNames.flavor: "Fondamentalmente, trasformiamo un sacco di piccoli fulmini in un'unica folgore gigante."

foreignNames.name: 雷電支配
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。雷電支配はそれにＸ点のダメージを与える。あなたは、あなたの手札から点数で見たマナ・コストがＸ以下のカード１枚を、そのマナ・コストを支払うことなく唱えてもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: 「要するに、たくさんの小さな雷を一つの大きな雷に変えるのだ。」

foreignNames.name: 전기지배
foreignNames.text: 원하는 목표를 정한다. 전기지배는 그 목표에게 피해 X점을 입힌다. 당신은 당신의 손에서 전환마나비용이 X 이하인 카드를 마나 비용을 지불하지 않고 발동할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: "기본적으로, 우린 작은 번개를 많이 모아서 큰 번개로 바꾸는 거야."

foreignNames.name: Eletrodominância
foreignNames.text: Eletrodominância causa X pontos de dano a qualquer alvo. Você pode conjurar um card com custo de mana convertido igual ou inferior a X da sua mão sem pagar seu custo de mana.
foreignNames.flavor: "Nós basicamente transformamos um monte de raiozinhos em um raiozão."

foreignNames.name: Электродоминация
foreignNames.text: Электродоминация наносит X повреждений любой цели. Вы можете разыграть карту заклинания с конвертированной мана-стоимостью не более X из вашей руки без оплаты ее мана-стоимости.
foreignNames.flavor: «Ну, мы фактически берем много мелких молний и делаем одну большую».

foreignNames.name: 控驭电能
foreignNames.text: 控驭电能对任意一个目标造成X点伤害。你可以从你手上施放一张总法术力费用等于或小于X的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。
foreignNames.flavor: 「基本上，我们只是把几束小闪电揉在一起变成一束大闪电。」

foreignNames.name: 控馭電能
foreignNames.text: 控馭電能對任意一個目標造成X點傷害。你可以從你手上施放一張總魔法力費用等於或小於X的牌，且不需支付其魔法力費用。
foreignNames.flavor: 「基本上，我們只是把幾束小閃電揉在一起變成一束大閃電。」

—Daiva, Gruul storyteller

foreignNames.flavor:

—Daiva, Gruul-Geschichtenerzählerin

foreignNames.name: Maaka salvaje

foreignNames.name: Maaka Feroce

"Perduti sono i dolci campi e le verdi foreste, dove i maaka pascolavano e su cui i lammasu si libravano. Perdute sono le terre selvagge, dove i nostri cuori erano liberi."

「失われしは緑豊かな牧草地に青々とした森林。マーカが歩きラマスーが羽ばたく場所。失われしは自然。我らの心が自由であった場所。」

foreignNames.name: Maaka Feroz
